experience: You and David both know Jaime Neufer
The Dating Doctor! Public Speaking and Dating Coach!

As a relationship expert, speaker and entertainer, I speak over 200 times per year and have a stable of "clients" that I coach through various relationship issues. I am exceptionally lucky to do what I do. I travel the world, make a wonderful living for my family, and help people find the love they deserve and desire.  It's not even a job.  It's a love, a passion and a blessing.
Founder and President, Coleman Productions, Inc. and The Coleman Entertainment Group
I serve as President / CEO and lead talent for a prestigious lecture agency and entertainment firm and have since 1993.
Coleman Productions, Inc. / Coleman Entertainment Group, Inc.
Widely considered one of the finest and most respected lecture and entertainment firms in the college market and beyond.
Director of Student Activities and University Center

A tradition-rich, private Jesuit Catholic University in Cincinnati, Ohio.  They emphasize the education of the body, mind and spirit of every student.  My experiences there helped prepare me to positively impact lives every day.  If you are looking at colleges, you could not find a better school or value for your money and they seek to improve every single day.
Sigma Phi Epsilon, Mortar Board Senior Honor Society, Omicron Delta Kappa.
Blessed to have studied under Dr. Gerald Saddlemire and Dr. Carney Strange who helped shape my thinking on higher education.

recommendations: Justin Orashan
Connection Catalyst | Community Cultivator | Human Potential Developer
December 7, 2012, Justin worked with David but at different companies

Dave is more than an entertainer, he's a life enriching speaker. Every year Dave has been invited back to the University of Akron for his Dating Doctor show and to present to students on leadership topics. Of our campus entertainers, Dave's show is easily one the most popular. As an involved student I've seen numerous speakers at conferences, seminars, and training events; Dave stands out as one of the most entertaining, engaging, and meaningful of these speakers - so much so that he's kept me coming back to see him present on five occasions!What is most inspiring about Dave is how much he cares for helping others. Every show he takes time to listen and give advice to individual students, both during and after his presentation. He goes beyond simply providing entertaining (but very valuable) dating advice by motivating students to build confidence and to empower themselves. These qualities make his presentations a huge asset to any campus community, and help him to shine as a genuinely outstanding individual!
Justin Orashan

Michelle Reneé Sciarini, M.A.
Lead Booking Agent; MayQuist Managenement, LLC
July 3, 2017, David worked with Michelle Reneé in different groups

I have known, worked with and respected Michelle for over 20 years. This timespan covers her work as an outstanding student leader at The University of Akron until now where she performs the duties of a professional marketing consultant, event planner and lead booking agent for MayQuist Management. She is one of those rare individuals whose talent covers several genres including graphic artist, major event planner, artist agent and manager, professional speaker and higher education consultant. When you work with Michelle, you know that your job will be completed in a timely manner and to the highest degree possible. As may be evident to you, I highly recommend Michelle to you. She knows the collegiate and corporate markets extremely well and this is highly beneficial to you!

Christine Logan
Entertainment Specialist / Producer at LoganMania
February 12, 2010, David was a client of Christine’s

It is my sincere pleasure to recommend Miss Christine Logan to you as an Entertainment Agent.  I have had the good fortune of riding the wave of a career as a speaker/entertainer that has spanned two decades, taken me all over the world, allowed me to touch the lives of millions of people and brought me over a dozen national awards for excellence.  The primary reason this all happened, is Christine Logan.  As my first agent, she helped to create, plan, form, mend and sustain my career.  She helped me create a brand that is, and has been known as the tops in its genre. Others could only marvel at the meteoric rise that I experienced and when people would ask me "David, how is this all happening for you?" I simply smiled and said, "Christine."  She is diligent in her work ethic, personable by nature, and tenacious in her representation of her clients, but never loses track that she is working with people who have put their reputations in her hands.  As is probably quite evident by now, I highly recommend Christine to you.  In a profession that can sometimes get a bit "sketchy" it is nice to know that there is one person you can go to who will always take the high road. That person is Christine. She has learned that the view is better from there!  Hire her. Now.  You can thank me later!
Christine Logan

summary: I am proud to serve as Founder, CEO and President of Coleman Speaks,  an award-winning Speaker's Bureau based in Cincinnati, Ohio. As an entertainer, speaker and author on dating, relationships, romance, sex, marriage, divorce, leadership, team building, character and living a remarkable life, I strive to make a positive impact on people and change lives every day.   I'm a former columnist, radio talk show host and have appeared on hundreds of radio and television programs worldwide including CNN, FOX and Access Hollywood.  You can contact me at TheDatingDoctor@mac.com, www.DatingDoctor.com or DavidColemanSpeaks.com. My areas of expertise include: Dating, Relationships, Romance, Sex, Marriage, Divorce, Leadership Training, Team Building, Character Development, Living and Leading with Intention and Urgency, Becoming a Masterful Public Speaker, Living a Remarkable Life and programs that positively impact our Military Service Members and their families. I love what I do, and always have, thus I have never "worked" a day in my life.  I have served others to the best of my ability and continue to do so every single day.  I am beyond blessed.
